entry.title: Bitcoin Protocol Specification
entry.summary: The author, Krzysztof Okupski, has created a document on Bitcoin's design that can be found on enetium.com/resources/Bitcoin.pdf. The document is praised by Isidor for being a great reference for those who want to gain insight into Bitcoin's design. Isidor suggests the idea of putting the document source under version control to facilitate tracking future protocol improvements in the document. Krzysztof thanks Isidor in advance for any further improvement proposals and hopes that the document proves useful to the community.
